challenges.title: 30 Days of LeetCode
challenges.description: Consistent problem solving to master Data Structures and Algorithms.
challenges.details: This quest involves solving at least one medium or hard problem daily on LeetCode. Focusing on Dynamic Programming and Graphs this month.

challenges.title: 1 Week AI Agent Build
challenges.description: Building a fully autonomous research assistant using LLMs.
challenges.details: Completed a multi-agent system using LangGraph that can research topics on the web and generate a 5-page report in markdown.

challenges.title: 180 Days of Pro Coding
challenges.description: Daily contribution to open source and personal projects.
challenges.details: Maintaining a steady stream of commits to various open-source C# and React projects. Aiming for 180 days of consecutive green squares.

challenges.title: Advanced System Design Sprint
challenges.description: Mastering high-level architecture and scalability patterns.
challenges.details: Planning to dive deep into distributed database internals, consensus algorithms like Paxos/Raft, and eventual consistency models.

challenges.title: Fullstack Cloud Deployment
challenges.description: Dockerizing and deploying a microservices app to AWS.
challenges.details: Setting up a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, ECR, and ECS with Fargate for a scalable .NET Core backend.

challenges.title: Rust Fundamentals Sprint
challenges.description: Learning Memory Safety and Ownership in Rust.
challenges.details: Diving into the borrow checker, lifetimes, and systems programming patterns. Building a CLI tool for file encryption.

challenges.title: ASP.NET Core Security Audit
challenges.description: Deep dive into OAuth2, OpenID Connect, and Data Protection in .NET.
challenges.details: Implementing a custom Authorization Provider, securing sensitive data with Data Protection API, and conducting a full penetration test using OWASP ZAP on a microservices mesh.

challenges.title: Graph Algorithm Mastery
challenges.description: Implementing complex graph theories in Java.
challenges.details: Focusing on Network Flow, Tarjan's SCC, and heavy-light decomposition for advanced competitive programming.

challenges.title: Quantum Computing 101
challenges.description: Introduction to Qubits and Quantum Gates.
challenges.details: Using Qiskit to build and simulate simple quantum circuits. Understanding superposition and entanglement.
